properties.Name: ManufacturingSiteProductProduction
properties.Description: The quantity of pharmaceutical product manufactured and shipped, by a manufacturing site during a specific period.

Columns.Name: ManufacturerFacilityId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Manufacturer Facility.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: ManufacturerId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Manufacturer.

Columns.Name: ProductUnitsPlannedQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of Product planned to be built during the period.

Columns.Name: ProductUnitsManufacturedQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of Product actually manufactured during the period.

Columns.Name: ProductUnitsShippedQuantity
Columns.Description: The quantity of Product shipped during the period.
